name: Quick Scope - MLG
description:
I created this game back in early-2018. I have decided to release it here because why not.

In the game, you will be attacked by Mountain Dew, Doritos, and Illuminati symbols. You are equipped with a sniper. Your goal is to get the biggest high score as possible. 

Music: https://soundcloud.com/themobilisc/damn-son-mlg-song

Ways to achieve points:

  • shout Mountain Dew, Doritos, and Illuminati symbols.
  • Getting hits sort after hits will grant you a combo bonus.
  • Horizontal movement in combos will grant extra points.
